data.name: Shrine of Tails
data.detailed_description:
The world has long ceased to be what it used to be. Once on the doorstep of an ancient shrine, you feel a surge of strength. There are 5 girls inside waiting for you. Touch them and fix the humanity (your private life). Take part in exciting mini-games, find ancient artifacts and communicate with the girls with amazing tails. The temple and the Shrine of Tails characters are waiting for you!

■ Gameplay ■


    ● Defeat the girls in an entertaining "Rock-Paper-Scissors" mini-game and get access to their nudity and sex scenes
    ● Find ancient artifacts hidden in the darkest corners of the Shrine
    ● Chat with girls and earn their favor in dialogues

■ Story ■


Uncover the secret of the mysterious Shrine by finding a use for the artifact you brought with. Cold corridors of dark fantasy are waiting for you, intertwined with the warm fountain of a romantic visual novel. The non-linear spirit of the story will allow you to feel it to the fullest.

■ Game features ■


    ● Gallery mode filled with dozens of illustrations
    ● 4 female characters
    ● Non-linear history
    ● Mini-games: "rock-paper-scissors" and hidden objects

data.short_description: You ended up in an ancient shrine and now you have to figure out what is going on here. Meet the girls living here and show them the power of your "artifact".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.2+ GHz & SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2+ GHz & SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, All characters are over 21 years old.
